name: Workday
description: Integrate with Workday to list, get, search and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Workers
tools.description: List workers from Workday. Returns a paginated list of all workers in the organization.

tools.name: Get Worker
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific Workday worker by their ID. Returns name, position, department, manager, and contact info.

tools.name: Search Workers
tools.description: Search for workers in Workday by name, email, or other criteria. Returns matching worker records.

tools.name: List Organizations
tools.description: List organizations (departments, cost centers, divisions) in Workday. Useful for understanding the org structure.

tools.name: Get Time Off Balance
tools.description: Get time-off balance information for a specific Workday worker. Shows available balances across different time-off plans.

tenant.label: Workday Tenant
tenant.description: Your Workday tenant name (e.g. "mycompany" for mycompany.workday.com)
